Plot: Chino and Lani shared a relationship some time ago. Their relationship ended with Chino leaving Lani feeling betrayed and abandoned. Now, Chino finds that Lani is married to his brother ...
Title: Trophy Wife
Writer: Elwood Perez (title and story), Keiko Aquino (screenplay)
Actors: Cristine Reyes, Heart Evangelista, John Estrada, Derek Ramsay
